paultan.org/2013/06/2014-porsche-lmp1-sp.snippet: The new Porsche LMP1 sports prototype has been unveiled at the Porsche Motorsports Research and Development Centre in Weissach, Germany. It will compete in the sports car World Endurance Championship (WEC) and the 24 Hours of Le Mans from 2014.
